name: OptionBuilderTest
description: Unit tests for the OptionBuilder class in the Apache Commons CLI library.

test_cases.name: testBaseOptionCharOpt
test_cases.description: Tests the creation of a base option with a character option.

test_cases.name: testBaseOptionStringOpt
test_cases.description: Tests the creation of a base option with a string option.

test_cases.name: testBuilderIsResettedAlways
test_cases.description: Tests that the OptionBuilder is reset after an exception.

test_cases.name: testCompleteOption
test_cases.description: Tests the creation of a complete option with various attributes.

test_cases.name: testCreateIncompleteOption
test_cases.description: Tests the rejection of an incomplete option creation.

test_cases.name: testIllegalOptions
test_cases.description: Tests the handling of illegal option characters.

test_cases.name: testOptionArgNumbers
test_cases.description: Tests the setting of argument numbers for an option.

test_cases.name: testSpecialOptChars
test_cases.description: Tests the handling of special option characters.

test_cases.name: testTwoCompleteOptions
test_cases.description: Tests the creation of two complete options with different attributes.
